description: Front Garden - Left Hand Side G1 - 2x Limes Reduce to previous reduction points, retaining young furnishing growth by a reduction of approximately 1.8 metres of the branch length. Remove basal and epicormic growth. . The trees are located to the front of the property to the left hand side . Reduction works are part of a maintenance program to maintain the trees at a suitable size for their location . To reduce the encroachment from the rear boundary area of the neighbouring property .
